name: Into the dark (itch) (Caroline Clark)
description:
Windows builds are unknown. Developed on Mac.

Warning: this game has no tutorial. The controls are below:

- The controls are WASD or UP DOWN RIGHT LEFT.

- Press L to turn your light on. Hold it down to briefly power it up to a laser. This can smash boulders and kill the enemy.

Team: Caroline - Does What The Fuck She Wants - Clark.
